BG_DrawDeckSuits
void BG_DrawDeckSuits(
Card *in_cards,
int *in_suits
)

Draw the given cards deck with provided suits (multiple suit).

Parameters
in_cards
Card*

Deck of cards to draw on screen.

in_suits
int*

Suits for input deck.(Must provide same suit for every 13 card) and (Length of  in_cards == Length of in_suits) should be True.

BG_GetFullDeck
void BG_GetFullDeck(
Card *in_cards
)

Get Full deck of cards with all suits.

Parameters
in_cards
Card*

Buffer to receive deck of cards.  Must be of length 'FULL_DECK' with one extra space for NULL.

Card *in_cards
)

Get a deck of cards with suits.

Parameters
in_cards
Card*

BG_GetRandDeck
void BG_GetRandDeck(
Card *in_cards,
int deck_type
)

Get random cards deck with same suit for all cards.

Parameters
in_cards
Card*

Buffer to receive random deck of cards. Must be of length 'deck_type' selected with one extra space for NULL.

deck_type
int

Type of deck . Use Enum DECK_TYPE to provide value.

)

Add single card to deck.

Parameters
in_cards
Card*

Deck of cards.

in_card

size_t

Position where to add card.

Returns

BG_AddCards
bool BG_AddCards(
Card *in_cards,
Card *in_card,
size_t *card_pos
)

Add multiple cards to deck.

Parameters
in_cards
Card*

Deck of cards.

in_card
Card*

Cards to add on deck. (Must have one extra space for Null terminating}.

card_pos
size_t*

Positions where to add cards.

Returns

TRUE if card was added otherwise FALSE.

BG_AddCardsAt
bool BG_AddCardsAt(
Card *in_cards,
Card *in_card,
int add_cards,
int add_side
)

Add multiple cards to deck at side.

Parameters
in_cards
Card*

Deck of cards.

in_card
Card*

Cards to add on deck. (Must have one extra space for Null terminating}.

add_cards
int

Total number of cards to add. (Optional provide NULL if you want to copy all cards).

add_side
int

Side where to add cards at. Use Enum SIDES to provide value.

Returns

TRUE if card was added otherwise FALSE.

BG_RemoveCardsFrom
bool BG_RemoveCardsFrom(
Card *in_cards,
int rmv_cards,
int rmv_side
)

Remove multiple cards from deck sides.

Parameters
in_cards
Card*

Deck of cards.

rmv_cards
int

Total number of cards to remove from deck.

rmv_side
int

Side from where to remove cards from. Use Enum SIDES to provide value.

Returns

TRUE if all cards were removed otherwise FALSE.
